sentences.sContent: Charlotte Bronte used it in a story published in 1849.
sentences.sCn: 夏洛蒂·勃朗特在1849年发表的故事中用到了这种说法。

sentences.sContent: An electronic-book firm is adding background noises and music to the works of Charlotte Bronte, Sir Arthur Conan Doyle and William Shakespeare in the hope of attracting younger readers.
sentences.sCn: 一家电子书公司正在为夏洛蒂·勃朗特、柯南和莎士比亚的作品添加背景音乐，以期望吸引年轻读者。
